ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class ImageLineSetDefault<T extends IImageLine>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLineSetDefault<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IImageLineSet<T>

    public abstract class ImageLineSetDefault<T extends IImageLine>
extends Object
implements IImageLineSet<T>
    Default implementation of IImageLineSet.

    Supports all modes: single cursor, full rows, or partial. This should not be used for

    • Method Detail

      • createImageLine

        protected abstract T createImageLine()

      • getImageLine

        public T getImageLine(int n)
        Retrieves the image line

        Warning: the argument is the row number in the original image

        If this is a cursor, no check is done, always the same row is returned

        Specified by:
        getImageLine in interface IImageLineSet<T extends IImageLine>

      • getImageLineRawNum

        public T getImageLineRawNum(int r)
        does not check for valid range
        Specified by:
        getImageLineRawNum in interface IImageLineSet<T extends IImageLine>
        Parameters:
        r - Should normally go from 0 to IImageLineSet.size()
        Returns:

      • hasImageLine

        public boolean hasImageLine(int n)
        True if the set contains this image line

        Warning: the argument is the row number in the original image

        If this works as cursor, this returns true only if that is the number of its "current" line

        Specified by:
        hasImageLine in interface IImageLineSet<T extends IImageLine>

      • size

        public int size()
        How many lines does this object contain?
        Specified by:
        size in interface IImageLineSet<T extends IImageLine>

      • imageRowToMatrixRowStrict

        public int imageRowToMatrixRowStrict(int imrow)
        Same as imageRowToMatrixRow(int), but returns negative if invalid

      • matrixRowToImageRow

        public int matrixRowToImageRow(int mrow)
        Converts from matrix row number (0 : nRows-1) to image row number
        Parameters:
        mrow - Matrix row number
        Returns:
        Image row number. Returns trash if mrow is invalid

      • imageRowToMatrixRow

        public int imageRowToMatrixRow(int imrow)
        Converts from real image row to this object row number.

        Warning: this always returns a valid matrix row (clamping on 0 : nrows-1, and rounding down)

        Eg: rowOffset=4,rowStep=2 imageRowToMatrixRow(17) returns 6 , imageRowToMatrixRow(1) returns 0

      • createImageLineSetFactoryFromImageLineFactory

        public static <T extends IImageLine> IImageLineSetFactory<T> createImageLineSetFactoryFromImageLineFactory(IImageLineFactory<T> ifactory)
